channel.title: CVE Feed for GOG.COM -- GOG Galaxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GOG.COM -- GOG Galaxy

item.title: CVE-2018-3974|2024-08-05T04:57:24.476Z -- gog.com -- gog%20galaxy
item.description: An exploitable local privilege elevation vulnerability exists in the file system permissions of GOG Galaxy's install directory. An attacker can overwrite an executable that is launched as a system service on boot by default to exploit this vulnerability and execute arbitrary code with system privileges.
